title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press 'Ok', I get the following error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. It seems that the problem is caused by setting the output location and classpath as two separate operations. Setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
EB: Setting the classpath and output location should be combined into a single operation, to avoid creating an illegal state.
SR:
1. Open the settings for the project.
2. Set the classpath and output location as one operation.
3. Save the settings and try to compile the project again.
